subject: Mine That Bird (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: To commemorate Chip Woolley’s Kentucky Derby win, his friend Kelsie Maynard, who owns a buckle company, made him a belt buckle that he’s worn every day since.
snippet: To commemorate Chip Woolley’s Kentucky Derby win, his friend Kelsie Maynard, who owns a buckle company, made him a belt buckle that he’s worn every day since.
